about_the_game:
Lady Death: Demonicron is an all new side-scrolling, sword-slicing, magic-wielding, 15 level, multiplayer beat-em-up that takes the best aspects of the 90's arcade classics. A little bit of Streets of Rage, a pinch of Golden Axe and a dash of Mortal Kombat - all mixed together with a killer 90's industrial-metal soundtrack.

All Lady Death wants is to mourn a fallen friend in peace. Then in infernal portal rips open and a throng of demon scum storms the cemetary gates. Little does Lady Death know, the most brutal battle of her undead life has just begun.

Malevolent forces tear Lady Death from one realm to another... From the stinking pits of Hell, to an undead heavy metal festival, to a demonic dinosaur catastrophe, to a cannibalistic, industrial nightmare. Through it all, one true ally stands at her side: Ravenheart, a haunted warrior armed with a savage sword and the touch of death, but will even his strength be enough?

content_descriptors.notes: 2D comic style bloody violence, and revealing costumes.

detailed_description:
Lady Death: Demonicron is an all new side-scrolling, sword-slicing, magic-wielding, 15 level, multiplayer beat-em-up that takes the best aspects of the 90's arcade classics. A little bit of Streets of Rage, a pinch of Golden Axe and a dash of Mortal Kombat - all mixed together with a killer 90's industrial-metal soundtrack.

All Lady Death wants is to mourn a fallen friend in peace. Then in infernal portal rips open and a throng of demon scum storms the cemetary gates. Little does Lady Death know, the most brutal battle of her undead life has just begun.

Malevolent forces tear Lady Death from one realm to another... From the stinking pits of Hell, to an undead heavy metal festival, to a demonic dinosaur catastrophe, to a cannibalistic, industrial nightmare. Through it all, one true ally stands at her side: Ravenheart, a haunted warrior armed with a savage sword and the touch of death, but will even his strength be enough?

name: Lady Death Demonicron

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9600 GT or AMD HD 3870 512MB
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 or Radeon HD 5750 or better
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: LADY DEATH: DEMONICRON is an all new side-scrolling, sword slicing, magic wielding, 15 level, multiplayer beat-em-up that takes the best aspects of the 1990's arcade classics - all mixed together with a killer 90's industrial-metal soundtrack!
